prompt: LinkedIn launch banner for ClientShell SaaS targeting professional services firms. White background, navy accents. Professional enterprise aesthetic. Bold headline: 'Look enterprise in 30 minutes.' Sub-headline: 'Built for accounting, legal, security, and consulting firms billing -300/hr who still send deliverables via Google Drive.' Feature grid 2x2: 'Custom subdomain' and 'Your logo plus colors' and 'Secure docs with expiry' and 'Activity log: know when clients read your proposals'. Right: portal mockup. Bottom: pricing 'From /mo — free trial'. ClientShell branding. LinkedIn-appropriate professional layout.
